SEARCH
Package Collections.Graphs

Class Network<T>

java.lang.Object
Collections.Graphs.Graph<T>
Collections.Graphs.Network<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of object that the network will hold
All Implemented Interfaces:
GraphADT<T>, NetworkADT<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
ExtendedNetwork
public class Network<T> extends Graph<T> implements NetworkADT<T>
Network represents an adjacency matrix implementation of a network.

    • iteratorShortestPathIndices

      public Iterator<Integer> iteratorShortestPathIndices(int startIndex, int targetIndex)
      Method to determine the weight of the shortest path between two vertices To implement this method , we used the Dijkstra algorithm to find the shortest path So first of all , we learn at the slides of the discrete mathematics class and tried to adapt to the code plus we consulted the "Data Structures and Algorithm Analysis in Java" by Mark Allen Weiss , and we tried to adapt the code to our project
      Parameters:
      startIndex - the index of the starting vertex
      targetIndex - the index of the target vertex
      Returns:
      an iterator that contains the indices of the vertices that make up the shortest path between the two vertices
